title: Religious tensions in Poem 2 and partition

content.prompt: The religious tensions alluded to in Poem 2 would result most directly in which of the following?

choices.label: The migration of many South Asians to Great Britain
The development of new syncretic belief systems in India such as Sikhism and Bahaism
The Japanese invasion of India during the Second World War
The population resettlement following the partition of South Asia into India and Pakistan after independence

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
